protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28026
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated using RNeasy Mini Kit columns (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). RNA quality was assessed by Agilent 2100 bioanalyser using the RNA 6000 Nano Chip (Agilent Technologies, Amstelveen, The Netherlands), and quantity was determined by ND-1000 Spectrophotometer (NanoDrop Technologies, Inc., DE, USA).(Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = PCR)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28027
protocol.text: Equal amounts of RNA from triplicate samples were pooled.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28028
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana was grown on germination agar plates containing 0.5x Murashige-Skoog (MS) media with vitamins, 1.5% sucrose, 2.5 mM Mes, pH 5.7, and 0.8% agar at 23C with a 16-h photoperiod for 11 days(Parameters: time unit = hours, temperature unit = C, media = 1/2 MS media)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28029
protocol.text: Arabidopsis thaliana was grown on germination agar plates containing 0.5x Murashige-Skoog (MS) media with vitamins, 1.5% sucrose, 2.5 mM Mes, pH 5.7, and 0.8% agar at 23C with a 16-h photoperiod for 11 days. For cold treatment, the light-grown seedlings were incubated at 1C for 2 h with white fluorescent light. (Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C, media = 1/2 MS media)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28030
protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated using RNeasy Mini Kit columns (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany). RNA quality was assessed by Agilent 2100 bioanalyser using the RNA 6000 Nano Chip (Agilent Technologies, Amstelveen, The Netherlands), and quantity was determined by ND-1000 Spectrophotometer (NanoDrop Technologies, Inc., DE, USA).(Parameters: Extracted product = total_RNA, Amplification = PCR)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28031
protocol.text: Affymetrix CEL analysis(Parameters: Scanning hardware = GeneChip Scanner 3000 [Affymetrix], Scanning software = MAS/GCOS/GREX [Affymetrix])

protocol.name: P-MTAB-28032
protocol.text: Equal amounts of RNA from triplicate samples were pooled.
